name: BeMobility Srl
goal:
A network of 7 Italian companies – leaders in distributing vehicles and services to the logistics industry, with a capillary presence on the entire national territory – which get together to improve the way people and goods move throughout the country.

Road transport is responsible for about one fourth of the total CO2 emissions generated in Italy and Europe. Reducing the level of those emissions without undermining the quality and quantity of the transport service supplied is going to be the main challenge of transport companies in the 21st century.

BeMobility is the unavoidable partner of those companies seriously committed to reducing the environmental impact of their transportation activity.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Research and innovation, Transport
euInitiatives:
- Industry research and energy
- Transport and tourism
- Internal mrket and consumer protection
